sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { Toolbar, Button, Typography, Container } from "@material-ui/core"; import "react-owl-carousel2/lib/styles.css"; export const NewsProps = props => { return ( {props.title} {props.author} ); }; export class News extends Component { render() { return ( News List ); } }
